release_notes: Local QR code generation, QR caching, WiFi-friendly display, smart dialog detection
changelog: NEW: Local QR code generation - no more Google Charts API (uses BARCODER library)
NEW: QR codes cached on startup for instant display
NEW: WiFi QR codes show friendly format (WiFi: SSID | Password: xxx)
NEW: Monitor selection for QR display (Settings + arrow keys)
IMPROVED: Flash-free QR cycling - controls update without GUI rebuild
IMPROVED: Smart dialog detection - hides toolbar on smaller ProSelect windows
IMPROVED: Instructions moved to bottom of QR display
IMPROVED: Ps button color now matches other toolbar icons
